page.title: 14EDUCATION
page.content: IN OUR ARE THERE ARE TWELVE SCHOOLS, TWO NURSERY SCHOOLS, A VILLAGE SCHOOL CALLED {HURST}AND 8 PRIMARY SCHOOLS.THE LAST SCHOOL IS {ADDINGTON, IT IS A SCHOOL FOR CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL NEEDS,AGED BETWEEN 3-19.THE NAME {ADDINGTON}COMES FROM {SIR HENRY {ADDINGTON,}WHO ONCE LIVED IN WOODLEY. THE MAIN TYPE OF SCHOOLS ARE PRIMARY SCHOOLS.{SOUTHLAKE }INFANT AND NURSERY ARE ON A SEPARATE SIGHT THAN THE JUNIOR PART.WOODLEY{CHURCH OF {ENGLAND}SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN {1855.} THERE WERE SEVERAL PRIVATELY RUN PLAYGROUPS AND THEY CATER FOR CHILDREN FROM 3-5 YEARS OLD.
